title: Talking About Work & Daily Routines
description: Practice speaking about your work life and daily schedule.

sentences.text: I usually wake up at seven o'clock.
I commute to work by subway.
sentences.tips: 'commute'의 강세는 두 번째 음절에 있습니다: com-MUTE.

sentences.text: What time do you start work?
I have a meeting at ten o'clock.
How often do you work overtime?
sentences.tips: 'How often'을 한 덩어리로 발음하고, 'overtime'을 명확하게 하세요.

sentences.text: I sometimes work late when there's a deadline.
sentences.translation: 마감일이 있을 때 가끔 늦게까지 일해요.

sentences.text: Can we take a short break?
I need to finish this report by Friday.
My colleague is helping me with the project.
What do you do after work?
I go to the gym twice a week.
I try to go to bed before midnight.

lines.text: What time do you usually start work?
I start at 9, but I usually arrive a bit early.
How do you get to the office?
I commute by subway. It takes about 40 minutes.
Not really. Maybe once or twice a month.
